00014 #ifndef U_POP3_CLIENT_H
00015 #define U_POP3_CLIENT_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/net/tcpsocket.h>
00018 #include <ulib/container/vector.h>
00019 
00020 #ifdef HAVE_SSL
00021 #  include <ulib/ssl/net/sslsocket.h>
00022 #endif
00023 
00090 class U_EXPORT UPop3Client : public UTCPSocket {
00091 public:
00092 
00093         enum POP3ClientStatus {
00094                 INIT,          // not logged in yet
00095                 AUTHORIZATION, // recv the greeting
00096                 TRANSACTION,   // identify successfully
00097                 UPDATE         // sent QUIT
00098                 };
00099 
00100         enum POP3ServerStatus {
00101                 OK,
00102                 BAD_STATE,
00103                 UNAUTHORIZED,
00104                 CANT_LIST,
00105                 NO_SUCH_MESSAGE,
00106                 CAPA_NOT_SUPPORTED,
00107                 STLS_NOT_SUPPORTED,
00108                 UIDL_NOT_SUPPORTED
00109                 };
00110 
00115         UPop3Client(bool bSocketIsIPv6 = false) : UTCPSocket(bSocketIsIPv6), buffer(U_CAPACITY)
00116                 {
00117                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPop3Client, "%b", bSocketIsIPv6)
00118 
00119                 state   = INIT;
00120                 num_msg = -1;
00121 #  ifdef HAVE_SSL
00122                 tls     = 0;
00123 #  endif
00124                 }
00125 
00126         virtual ~UPop3Client();
00127 
00132         bool connectServer(const UString& server, int port = 110, uint32_t timeout = U_TIMEOUT);
00133 
00134         bool startTLS();
00135 
00136         // Capabilities
00137 
00138         int getCapabilities(UVector<UString>& vec);
00139 
00140         bool isSTLS(UVector<UString>& v) const       { return (v.find(U_STRING_FROM_CONSTANT("STLS"))       != U_NOT_FOUND); }
00141         bool isUIDL(UVector<UString>& v) const       { return (v.find(U_STRING_FROM_CONSTANT("UIDL"))       != U_NOT_FOUND); }
00142         bool isPIPELINING(UVector<UString>& v) const { return (v.find(U_STRING_FROM_CONSTANT("PIPELINING")) != U_NOT_FOUND); }
00143 
00154         bool login(const char* user, const char* passwd);
00155 
00156         // Varie
00157 
00158         int getSizeMessage(uint32_t n);
00159         int getUIDL(UVector<UString>& vec);
00160 
00161         int getNumMessage() { getSizeMessage(0); return num_msg; }
00162 
00163         // Execute an pop3 session
00164 
00165         UString getHeader(uint32_t n);
00166         UString getMessage(uint32_t n);
00167 
00168         bool reset();
00169         bool deleteMessage(uint32_t n);
00170 
00171         // PIPELINING
00172 
00173         bool deleteAllMessage();
00174         int  getAllHeader(UVector<UString>& vec);
00175         int  getAllMessage(UVector<UString>& vec);
00176 
00177         // Quit an pop3 session
00178 
00179         bool quit();
00180 
00181         // DEBUG
00182 
00183 #ifdef DEBUG
00184         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00185 #endif
00186 
00187 protected:
00188 #ifdef HAVE_SSL
00189         USSLSocket* tls;
00190 #endif
00191 
00192         UString buffer, capa;
00193         POP3ClientStatus state;
00194         int pos, end, response, num_msg;
00195 
00196 private:
00197         const char* status() U_NO_EXPORT;
00198         bool syncCommand(int eod, const char* format, ...) U_NO_EXPORT;
00199         bool syncCommandML(const UString& req, int* vpos, int* vend) U_NO_EXPORT;
00200 
00201         UPop3Client(const UPop3Client&) : UTCPSocket(false) {}
00202         UPop3Client& operator=(const UPop3Client&)                       { return *this; }
00203 };
